data.oai_dc:dc: This archive contains fasta files for the genome (Hydra 2.0 assembly available at https://research.nhgri.nih.gov/hydra/) and the de novo Hydra vulgaris (AEP) transcriptome (aepLRv2) as well as scripts to create bowtie2 references. It also holds .dict and .refFlat files used by the Drop-seq pipeline.
